<p>This tests that Text nodes do no have attributes nor hasAttributes.</p><p>On success, you will see a series of "<span class="pass">PASS</span>" messages, followed by "<span class="pass">TEST COMPLETE</span>".</p>
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> Text.prototype.hasOwnProperty("hasAttributes") is false</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> "hasAttributes" in text is false</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> "attributes" in text is false</span><br />
<span><span class="pass">PASS</span> successfullyParsed is true</span><br />
<br /><span class="pass">TEST COMPLETE</span><br />
